remarks: If two elements of ` D ` have the same periodic image in ` ( A (,] B ) ` then they are equal.  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
statement:
fourierdlem19.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. RR ) $.
fourierdlem19.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. RR ) $.
fourierdlem19.altb $e |- ( ph -> A < B ) $.
fourierdlem19.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. RR ) $.
fourierdlem19.d $e |- D = { y e. ( ( A + X ) (,] ( B + X ) ) | E. k e. ZZ ( y + ( k x. T ) ) e. C } $.
fourierdlem19.t $e |- T = ( B - A ) $.
fourierdlem19.e $e |- E = ( x e. RR |-> ( x + ( ( |_ ` ( ( B - x ) / T ) ) x. T ) ) ) $.
fourierdlem19.w $e |- ( ph -> W e. D ) $.
fourierdlem19.z $e |- ( ph -> Z e. D ) $.
fourierdlem19.ezew $e |- ( ph -> ( E ` Z ) = ( E ` W ) ) $.
fourierdlem19 $p |- ( ph -> -. W < Z ) $.
$d A x $.
$d A y $.
$d B x $.
$d B y $.
$d T x $.
$d W x $.
$d X y $.
